flawed_nl_solution:
Matt spent on math and science 30% + 40% = 70% of the time.
This means he did homework from these two subjects for 70/100 * 150 minutes = <<70/100*150=1500/7>>1500/7 minutes.
So Matt spent 150 minutes - 1500/7 minutes = <<150-1500/7=-450/7>>-450/7 minutes doing homework from other subjects.
#### -450/7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 105, not 1500/7. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
